阿難.definition: Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple

阿馬遜.definition: Amazon; also written 亞馬遜|亚马逊[Ya4 ma3 xun4]

阿魏.definition: Ferula resin (used in TCM); Resina Ferulae

阿魯巴.definition: (Tw) (slang) a prank, prevalent in Chinese schools and known as "happy corner" in Hong Kong, in which several people carry a victim with his legs spread open, bringing his groin up against a pole or tree trunk
